Container.Name: Pinchflat
Container.Overview: Pinchflat is your next YouTube media manager **This is a pre-release of Pinchflat. Things will change and may break. Use at your own risk** Pinchflat is a lightweight and self-contained tool for automatically downloading and organizing media from YouTube

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: Pinchflat config storage path. Default is /mnt/user/appdata/pinchflat

Config.Name: Download Path
Config.Description: Path to store downloaded media. Ideally separate from your other media like TV shows.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Pinchflat web UI port. Default is 8945

Config.Name: Auth Username
Config.Description: The username for HTTP basic authentication. Leave blank to disable. Default is blank

Config.Name: Auth Password
Config.Description: The password for HTTP basic authentication. Leave blank to disable. Default is blank

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Set to debug for more verbose logging or when troubleshooting. Default is info

Config.Name: Expose Feed Endpoints
Config.Description: Set to any value to expose feed endpoints. See docs on RSS feeds for explanation. Default is blank
